channel.title: second language on Gabriel Nakamura
channel.description: Recent content in second language on Gabriel Nakamura

item.title: More than words
item.description: Departure Three weeks ago from the moment that I’m writing this chronicle I made one of the toughest decisions of my life, which was moving to another country. I landed in the United States to start a new job. This represented to me an opportunity that I haven’t had during my Ph.D. in Brazil due to the cut of budgets promoted by the Federal government. After almost 10 presentation letters, I was called for an interview at Texas A&M University-Corpus Christi.
